```{r}
# transfer annotation 2.0 from integrated object to the patient-specific object 

# modify integrated object cell names so the format matches
rownames(data.int@meta.data) <- substring(rownames(data.int@meta.data), 2)

# get common cells
common_cells <- intersect(rownames(data.int@meta.data), rownames(data@meta.data))

# transfer annotation
transfer <- data.int@meta.data[common_cells, "Annotation_2.0"]
names(transfer) <- data.int@meta.data[common_cells,] %>% rownames()
transfer %>% head()

data <- AddMetaData(data, transfer, col.name = "Annotation_2.0")
```



```{r}
# remove double-negative T cells as well as NKs

  subset(subset = Annotation_2.0 != "γδ T-like") %>% 
  subset(subset = Annotation_2.0 != "Cycling γδ T-like") %>%
  subset(subset = Annotation_2.0 != "CD56dim CD16hi NK") %>%
  subset(subset = Annotation_2.0 != "CD56hi CD16lo NK")
data$Annotation_2.0 %>% unique()
```

```{r}
# Read Tumor TCR data
P03_S1 <- read.csv(paste0(sp.proj.dir, "/data/SERPENTINE_10_11/jobs/SPE_1_03_SCR_A_FRESH/SPE_1_03_SCR_A_FRESH/outs/per_sample_outs/SPE_1_03_SCR_A_FRESH/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
#P03_S2 <- read.csv(paste0(sp.proj.dir, "data/SERPENTINE_18_19/jobs/ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45neg/ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45neg/outs/per_sample_outs/ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45neg/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
P03_S3 <- read.csv(paste0(sp.proj.dir, "/data/SERPENTINE_14_15/jobs/SPE_1_03_C02_A_FRESH_C45/SPE_1_03_C02_A_FRESH_C45/outs/per_sample_outs/SPE_1_03_C02_A_FRESH_C45/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
P03_S4 <- read.csv(paste0(sp.proj.dir, "/data/SERPENTINE_18_19/jobs/ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45pos/ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45pos/outs/per_sample_outs/ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45pos/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
  
# Create a contigs list
contig_list_TCR <- list(P03_S1, P03_S3, P03_S4)

###############
# Combine TCR #
###############

combined_tcr <- combineTCR(contig_list_TCR, 
                ID = c( 
                  "SPE_1_03_SCR_A_FRESH", "SPE_1_03_C02_A_FRESH_C45", "ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45pos"
                  ), 
                samples = c(
                  "SERPENTINE_10_11", "SERPENTINE_14_15", "SERPENTINE_18_19"
                  )
                )


# rename to match sc

combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_10_11_SPE_1_03_SCR_A_FRESH$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_10_11_SPE_1_03_SCR_A_FRESH$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")
combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_14_15_SPE_1_03_C02_A_FRESH_C45$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_14_15_SPE_1_03_C02_A_FRESH_C45$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")
combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_18_19_ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45pos$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$SERPENTINE_18_19_ESP_1_03_EOT_A_FRESH_CD45pos$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")

combined.TCR <- combined_tcr
```

```{r}
# visualize TCR data
combined.TCR
```

```{r}
# Combine Expression - join RNA + TCR data
data <- combineExpression(
  combined.TCR, 
  data, 
  chain = "both",
  cloneCall="nt", 
  proportion = FALSE, 
  cloneSize=c(Single=1, Small=5, Medium=20, Large=50, Hyperexpanded=100))
```

```{r}
# separate alpga and beta chains
head(data@meta.data$CTnt) # combined expression using both chains, therefore we need to split them between alpha and beta chain
data$CTnt_TRA <- substr(data@meta.data$CTnt, 1, regexpr("_", data@meta.data$CTnt) - 1)
data$CTnt_TRB <- sub(".*_", "", data@meta.data$CTnt)
```

```{r}
# remove first and last 3 nucleotides from CTnt_beta
data$CTnt_TRB %>% head()
data$CTnt_TRB_short <- ifelse(nchar(data$CTnt_TRB) > 6, substring(data$CTnt_TRB, 4, nchar(data$CTnt_TRB) - 3), data$CTnt_TRB)

data$CTnt_TRB_short %>% head()
```


# Tumor-Blood Matching Clonotypes

```{r}
# read clonotypes found in tumor and peripheral blood both pre and post ICI
p03_pre_blood_tcr <- read.csv("/Users/gerarddeunercos/Documents/cluster1/gdeuner/SERPENTINE/data/tumour_blood_overlaping_clonotypes/SPE03_tumour_overlap_blood_pre.csv")
p03_post_blood_tcr <- read.csv("/Users/gerarddeunercos/Documents/cluster1/gdeuner/SERPENTINE/data/tumour_blood_overlaping_clonotypes/SPE03_tumour_overlap_blood_post.csv")
```

```{r}
# createbasic annotation for this analysis
data@meta.data <- data@meta.data %>%
  dplyr::mutate(cell_type = 
    if_else(grepl("CD4 T", Annotation_2.0), "CD4 T",
    if_else(grepl("CD8 T", Annotation_2.0), "CD8 T", Annotation_2.0))) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(cell_type = if_else(Annotation_2.0 == "CD4 T Regulatory", "Treg", cell_type))
```

```{r}
data$cell_type %>% unique()
```

```{r}
# plot umaps
DimPlot_scCustom(data, group.by = "cell_type", figure_plot = T, ) +
  labs(x = "UMAP 1", y = "UMAP 2") + 
  theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(), 
      axis.ticks.x=element_blank(), 
      axis.text.y=element_blank(), 
      axis.ticks.y=element_blank()) 
```

```{r}
# check matchings
unname(data$CTnt_TRB) %in% p03_pre_blood_tcr$cdr3_nt %>% table()
unname(data$CTnt_TRB) %in% p03_post_blood_tcr$cdr3_nt %>% table()
```

```{r}
# add flag indicating whether the clonotypes are found also in blood
data$blood_pre <- ifelse(data$CTnt_TRB %in% p03_pre_blood_tcr$cdr3_nt, T, F)
data$blood_post <- ifelse(data$CTnt_TRB %in% p03_post_blood_tcr$cdr3_nt, T, F)
data$blood <- ifelse((data$blood_pre | data$blood_post) == T, T, F)
```

```{r}
# check proportions
data$blood_pre %>% table()
data$blood_post %>% table()
data$blood %>% table()
```

```{r}
# take tumor-blood shared TCRs by patient and timepoints

# pre
p03.pre <- data@meta.data %>%
  select("CTnt", "CTnt_TRB", "cell_type", "Annotation_2.0", "blood_pre") %>%
  filter(blood_pre == T) %>%
  select("CTnt_TRB", "cell_type", "Annotation_2.0") %>%
  dplyr::rename(CTnt = CTnt_TRB, CellType_1_0 = cell_type, CellType_2_0 = Annotation_2.0)
write.csv(p03.pre %>% distinct(), file = "/Users/gerarddeunercos/Documents/cluster1/gdeuner/SERPENTINE/data/TCR_tumor_blood_analysis/Patient_03/files/SPE03_tumour_overlap_blood_pre_phenotype.csv")

# post
p03.post <- data@meta.data %>%
  select("CTnt", "CTnt_TRB", "cell_type", "Annotation_2.0", "blood_post") %>%
  filter(blood_post == T) %>%
  select("CTnt_TRB", "cell_type", "Annotation_2.0") %>%
  dplyr::rename(CTnt = CTnt_TRB, CellType_1_0 = cell_type, CellType_2_0 = Annotation_2.0)
write.csv(p03.post %>% distinct(), file = "/Users/gerarddeunercos/Documents/cluster1/gdeuner/SERPENTINE/data/TCR_tumor_blood_analysis/Patient_03/files/SPE03_tumour_overlap_blood_post_phenotype.csv")
``` 


## Tumor-Blood Differentially Expanded Clonotypes

```{r}
# read file containing differentially expanded clonotypes 
tcr.overlap <- read.csv("/Users/gerarddeunercos/Documents/cluster1/gdeuner/SERPENTINE/data/differential_expansion_overlap_tumour/SPE03_tumour_blood_differential_overlap.csv")
```

```{r}
# check sequences match
unname(data$CTnt_TRB_short) %in% tcr.overlap$cdr3_nt %>% table()
```

```{r}
# merge tcr info to seurat's metadata
data$cdr3_nt_diffExp <- tcr.overlap$cdr3_nt[match(data$CTnt_TRB_short, tcr.overlap$cdr3_nt)]
data$compartment_diffExp <- tcr.overlap$compartment[match(data$CTnt_TRB_short, tcr.overlap$cdr3_nt)]
data$tumour_diffExp <- tcr.overlap$tumour[match(data$CTnt_TRB_short, tcr.overlap$cdr3_nt)]
```

```{r}
# check proportions
data$compartment_diffExp %>% table()
data$tumour_diffExp %>% table()
```

```{r}
# save phenotype of differentially expanded tumor-blood clonotypes
p03.diffExp <- data@meta.data %>%
  select(CTnt, CTnt_TRB_short, cell_type, Annotation_2.0, cdr3_nt_diffExp, compartment_diffExp, tumour_diffExp) %>%
  filter(cdr3_nt_diffExp != "NA") %>%
  select(CTnt_TRB_short, compartment_diffExp, tumour_diffExp, cell_type, Annotation_2.0) %>%
  dplyr::rename(CTnt = CTnt_TRB_short, compartment = compartment_diffExp, tumour = tumour_diffExp, CellType_1_0 = cell_type, CellType_2_0 = Annotation_2.0)

write.csv(p03.diffExp %>% distinct(), file = "/Users/gerarddeunercos/Documents/cluster1/gdeuner/SERPENTINE/data/TCR_tumor_blood_analysis/Patient_03/files/SPE03_tumour_blood_differential_overlap_phenotype.csv")
```

```{r}
# quality control
p03.diffExp$CTnt %>% length()
p03.diffExp$CTnt %>% unique() %>% length()
intersect(p03.diffExp$CTnt, tcr.overlap$cdr3_nt) %>% length()
```
